1.name: Gold Firework
1.use: Starts a short coin giveaway. Participants can earn thousands of coins.
1.description: You lose money from buying this, in exchange for the joy of everyone else.

2.name: Bank Note
2.use: Use this to increase your bank capacity by 5000-25000 coins.
2.description: Transaction limits suck. How'd you even get that much money anyway?

3.name: Save State
3.use: If you die, you will not lose any coins and this item will be used up.

4.name: Apple
4.use: For the next 6 hours, your chance of dying is significantly reduced.
4.description: Guildmaster Wigglytuff won't be happy if you ate those.

5.name: Padlock
5.use: For 1 week, your wallet will be protected from stealers. This item may break if someone tries to steal from you.
5.description: You either open it the hard way or the smart way.

6.name: Bomb Trap
6.use: For the next 24 hours, anyone who tries to steal from you has a chance to step on it and die.

7.name: Azure Feather
7.description: A mysterious blue feather. No man knows about its origin.
